participant_1.background:
I love to watch 16 Candles with my family because we can relate to the characters.
I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.
I've had to make some tough decisions about my health that were not easy to make.
I keep a journal of my memories to help me remember how I used to feel when I was younger.
I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre.

participant_2.background:
I've been singing in the shower more often lately, and it's been a lot of fun!
I once pretended to be a sports fan and told the cop I was on my way to a game.
i cook every night.
i have more then 10 tattoos.
My longest relationship was four years.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing good, thank you for asking. I'm a bit of a homebody, but I enjoy taking trips to the beach. Do you have any fun hobbies?
I like to cook, sing in the shower, and I have a lot of tattoos. What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is 16 Candles. It's a classic! I love the characters and the story. What are your favorite things to cook?
I love to cook pasta dishes and seafood. I also make a mean lasagna! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love all kinds of music, but I especially like country music. I'm a big fan of Kenny Chesney and Brad Paisley. Do you like to watch any sports?
I like to watch football, but I'm not a huge sports fan. I'm more interested in the arts. I love going to the theatre and taking dance classes.
That's awesome! I love to go to the theatre too. I'm a big fan of musicals. I think they're so much fun!
Me too! I love the music and the dancing. What's your favorite thing about the theatre?
I love the way it can transport you to another world. It's like you're part of the story.
That's what I love about it too! I feel like I can escape from my everyday life and just enjoy the show
